alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:56PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Flathead County through 745 PM MDT... At 656 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Kalispell, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kalispell, Evergreen, Kila, Creston, La Salle and Somers. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 105 and 129. Highway 93 N between mile markers 103 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
